title: Account UTxO List
caption: A list of all UTxOs under management of this account, including amount and token lists.
subCaption: A UTxO is like a note of arbitrary value. Transactions spend it and put back 'change notes' to your wallet.
empty: This account does not have any UTxOs.

filter.headline: UTxO Filter
filter.caption: Set parameters or enter a search string to filter utxo list.
filter.search: Search by address, path or tx id...

controlledStake.label: controlled stake
controlledStake.tooltip: Total amount staked to the stake key of this account (either owned, external or in smart contracts).

ownedStake.label: Owned stake
ownedStake.tooltip: Amount of stake under direct control of this account.

notStaked.label: Not staked
notStaked.tooltip: ADA not staked, funds on enterprise addresses.

externallyStaked.label: Externally staked
externallyStaked.tooltip: ADA controlled by this account - combined with any external staking keys.
